template.name: RGr Template Hyper-V Server
template.description: Template discover Hyper-V VMs and check some their parameters.

trigger_prototype.name: VM {#VM.NAME} CPU usage too high
trigger_prototype.description: CPU usage more than 85% for last 30 minutes.

trigger_prototype.name: VM {#VM.NAME} integration services requires update
trigger_prototype.description: VM {#VM.NAME} requires to update Ingegration Services.

trigger_prototype.name: VM {#VM.NAME} replicationg health is {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: VM {#VM.NAME} replicationg health is not good now. Replication state: {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger_prototype.name: VM {#VM.NAME} replicationg state is {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: VM {#VM.NAME} replicationg state is not replicating now. Replication state: {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger.name: Cannot obtain VMs data
trigger.description: Cannot obtain virtual machine data from Hyper-V server.
